content.question: The parametric function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>, where <math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses equals t squared minus t minus 4"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses equals negative 5 plus e to the power of t"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mi>t</mi></msup></math>. On which of the following intervals is <math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses greater than 0"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses less than 0"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 1.562 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.562</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 1.562 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.562</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
